## Theme variable

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
Theme: {
    ascii(): {
        characters: IThemeCharacters;
        styles: IThemeStyle;
    };
    unicode(): {
        characters: IThemeCharacters;
        styles: IThemeStyle;
    };
}
```
